#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n;
        cin>>n;
        ll dp[n],a[n];
    cin>>a[0];
        for(ll i=1;i<n;i++){
                cin>>a[i];
            dp[i]=a[i]-a[i-1];
        }
       ll start=1;
       ll en=n-1;
        ll s=0,mi,ans=0;
        while(start<=en)
        {
           s=mi=dp[start];
            for(ll i=start+1;i<n;i++){
            s+=dp[i];
                if(s<mi)
                mi=s,start=i;
            }ans+=mi;
                start++;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;

    }
}
